The Quranic researcher, and drink here what you were doing in the world of good deeds with faith, and otherwise, we are like that, like that, the reward of the greatness, not From it, and what is meant by the righteous, the precedent, their remembrance, except that he put the phenomenon, the position of the guerrilla, praising them with the description of the charity, also with the goodness, It is intended by the righteous and the good people who are the believers, and there is no significance in it for the dismissal of the enemy of the disobedience of the people of the people in the fire and the end of the matter.
